pkmkdoc.description: This package installs the HP StoreOpen Standalone.

requirement.message-title: Unable to install HP StoreOpen Standalone
requirement.message: The ICU libraries have not been tested with versions of OS X earlier than 10.5.6.

requirement.message-title: Unable to install HP StoreOpen Standalone
requirement.message: The MacFuse package for 10.6/OSXFUSE package for 10.7 and above is not installed on this system. Please install it before attempting to install HP StoreOpen Standalone.

requirement.message-title: Unable to install HP StoreOpen Standalone
requirement.message: The ICU framework version 50.1.2 is not installed on this system. The ICU framework version 50.1.2 is bundled with the HP StoreOpen Standalone installer image file.
